detectors.description:
AmpleCapital._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AmpleCapital.sol#477-495) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AmpleCapital.sol#487)
detectors.markdown:
[AmpleCapital._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AmpleCapital.sol#L477-L495) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AmpleCapital.sol#L487)
